Title: Prohibits the disclosure of immigration status for victims of domestic violence
Summary: Prohibits disclosure of immigration status for victims of domestic violence.
LawCode: Amd §§140.10 & 530.11, add §2.25, CP L; amd §459-h, Soc Serv L; amd §812, Fam Ct Act; add §844, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, the social services law, the family court act and the executive law, in relation to maintaining the confidentiality of immigration status for victims of domestic violence
